TopicTitle: Seeking 3D model commission for Arecibo-like radio dish

Articles.Content:
I had someone work this up for me a few years ago however it was unfortunately never delivered. My deep space network is finally nearing completion this year and I will soon want to start showing off the various facilities but I wouldn't feel right doing so without the 200m Arekibo radio dish. Other static packs have what I need for 60m and smaller dishes, but the old KerbinSide Arekibo static is not up the current standard.

Please PM me with rates if interested. Delivery would be anytime by the end of this year. I'm very flexible when it comes to artistic vision and don't need to stick very close to Arecibo's design, but that would be simplest with lots of easy reference material. Other than this, the only other artwork I've commissioned for KSA was from @yorshee on two occasions and you can contact her on twitter to know that I'm easy to work with collaboratively and pay promptly on delivery
I could do this! What exactly do you need?

5 hours ago, MAFman said:

I could do this! What exactly do you need?

I have someone already on the job, but if that falls through I will let you know

Anyone else interested in the work please still post below
If needed, I have some experience. Portfolio: https://www.instagram.com/vabienart/
